name: Candy World - Run Through Magical Land of Candies Free

description:
Candy World - Run Through Magical Land of Candies Free is the ultimate adventure across a vast land . You came across many unforeseen dangers and enemies as she follows a trail of magical coins and mystical objects that help along her quest in Magical Land.

Play her action packed adventure journey, as you leaps from platform to platform, through a challenging maze of obstacles and dangerous bad guys.

This game is loads of fun, So what are you waiting for. Download and play Candy World Run Through Magical Land, LIVE in the App Store, This game is loads of fun, So what are you waiting for. Download and play Candy World Run Through Magical Land, LIVE in the App Store, TODAY!
